alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Citrus, southwestern Sumter, Pasco and Hernando Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Hill n Dale to near Hudson. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Dade City, Bushnell, Hudson, Homosassa Springs, Lutz, St. Leo, Weeki Wachee, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Zephyrhills West, Land O Lakes, Hernando County Airport, Wesley Chapel South, Timber Pines, Hill n Dale, Homosassa and Jasmine Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter
